subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The former Ranger Benoit Pouliot, who signed a five-year, $20 million deal with the Oilers last spring, scored the go-ahead goal in Edmonton’s 3-1 victory.
snippet: The former Ranger Benoit Pouliot, who signed a five-year, $20 million deal with the Oilers last spring, scored the go-ahead goal in Edmonton’s 3-1 victory.
